text: is a Japanese football player for SC Sagamihara. ==Career== After playing for the football team of the Tokyo International University, Furukawa joined SC Sagamihara in January 2018.http://www.scsagamihara.com/news/post/52355 ==Club statistics== Updated to 29 August 2018.Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑ハンディ版 2018 (NSK MOOK)", 7 February 2018, Japan, (p. 247 out of 289) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
